author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-U.S. charges two men over alleged ATM jackpotting scheme
text: Feb 5 (Reuters) - u.s. Announces criminal bank fraud charges against two men over alleged atm ‘jackpotting’ scheme u.s. Says alex alberto fajin-diaz, of spain, and argenys rodriguez, of springfield, massachusetts, appeared before a federal judge and are being detained u.s. Says case is linked to a possible attack on an atm in cromwell, connecticut that had been compromised with malware and was dispensing $20 bills u.s. Says defendants were found in possession of tools and devices consistent with atm jackpotting, and more than $9,000 in $20 bills
